title: Tetsuwan Atom: Atom Tanjou no Himitsu
synopsis: Doctor Tenma, chief of the Ministry of Science, brought a digital brain genome from an aircraft. Doctor Tenma begins a trip to Mars, then combines the genome with a robot. Doctor Tenma's son, Tobio, who had died in a traffic accident, has been revived.
staff: [['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Original Creator']], ['Nishita, Masayoshi', ['Animation Director']]]
